title: LoL High Ping Issues
body: So to start off, whenever I play LoL, I have at least 250 ping every game. I went through the entire connection guide (https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) trying to fix the problem, and I ran a traceroute which showed no response from 2 hosts (another 2 cutting out intermittently), and I contacted my ISP. I explained my issue, and they informed me that since this is the only game I'm having connection issues with, all the evidence points towards LoL being the problem. I have no idea what to do from here, but here is my traceroute - https://gyazo.com/d0d1108b2295176ebf44b4469c3cca52 Another thing to add, this traceroute is listing packet loss, however when I type in the IP in Command, it doesn't list any packet loss, but still shows 200+ ping - https://gyazo.com/46dcef572f8fcc8724f01ce61efa102a

replies.body: This has been happening to me for over 3-4 months now. Ive posted videos and on these forums twice now. I can't even rank up because i go into games not knowing if this is a "Lag game" or not. Seems like its a certain node(s) of LoL's that gives most people problems. Please fix. I want silver again!

I am having the same issue as everyone else.  Two days ago my ping was a steady 30-50. Since the Ascension game mode was available, my game starts out at 30-50 ping but with in 2 min to 8 min it ramps up to 400-500 and spikes to 11k, highest I have seen yet. When I close the game and reload the game it starts back at my initial 30-50 ping but with in 30 sec it ramps back up to 400 or more.  During this time I steadily get the prompt "Attempting to Reconnect".  I have tried multiple game through out the day making sure it was not during peek hours.  My latest game was at 9:30 central time and I could not move my champ for more than 1 and half minutes.

I have also checked and nothing is being used in my house that uses the internet nor is there any auto-updates taking place.

Currently LoL is unplayable and not enjoyable.

Got this problem too. I started a ranked game thinking my connection would be fine as it normally is. 450-500ms throughout the whole game, I closed everything that was using my connection. 

Literally only LoL and Skype were using it. Still had the ping, lost the ranked game because it was unplayable. I checked today in a bot game and it is still around that value. 

Something has broken this patch and I literally can't play the game. It's definitely not on my end. Hope this gets fixed ASAP.

Thanks for troubleshooting all of this, and we'd like to dig into this more to find out what's going on.  There definitely seem like a network issue happening, and it's hard to say if it's routing or maybe even due to hardware.  Reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our tech team can take a closer look.  Download our  [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752674-Network-System-and-League-of-Legends-Logs) to grab a set of logs for context.  We'll respond back to the ticket as soon as we can!
Same, since this patch it's been getting ridiculous.
